description:
Seven Knights - Time Wanderer -  Four Seasons Costume Set
 Tired of wearing costumes for only one season? Get costumes for all four seasons! Everything from Spring, Summer, Fall, and Winter!
 
 <Set Contents>
 - Vanessa's Costume "Messenger of Love"
 - Orly's Costume "Waltz of Frost Flowers"
 - Kagura's Costume "Cherry Blossom Priestess"
 - Lina's Costume "Chantress of Camellia"
 Teo's Costume "Blueberry Ganache"
 - Rudy's Costume "Absolute Order"
 - Elysia's Costume "Whiskey Bonbon"
 - Kris's Costume "Ice Prince"
 - Karma's Costume "Vengeful Blades"
 - Rin's Costume "Mint Chocolate"
 10 Total
 
 <Warning>
 - You can only purchase the costume set once.
 - You can equip in-game after purchasing.
 - Please claim from "May" in the Room of Sand.
 - Hero portraits don't change.
 - Costumes only change hero appearance - they don't increase stats.
name: Four Seasons Costume Set (10 Total)
